pages.text: Tired of hostile mobs spawning around you and your precious base? Well, no need to worry anymore! There’s a wonderful item called a powered lantern from Immersive Engineering. It prevents mob spawning up to 32 blocks! That’s quite a bit.$(br2)Though, you just can’t place it and it magically prevents spawning. You need to find a way to power it! Personally, I use windmills and flux

networks which is wireless power. I would describe how it all works, but… I’m not the best at words nor at tech, so I highly suggest researching Immersive Engineering and Flux Networks online to learn more about how they work. It's very easy and 100% worth it!
